import { useState, memo } from 'react' import './RegisterInformationRooms.scss' import { vietnamese, english } from '../../Languages/InputNameInformationService' import { vietnameseRoomType, englishRoomType } from '../../Languages/RoomType' import { TbCameraPlus } from 'react-icons/tb' import { BsTrash, BsArrowRight } from 'react-icons/bs' import { toast } from 'react-toastify' function RegisterInformationRooms({ languageSelected }) { let languageList = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? english : vietnamese)[0][1] let roomTypeList = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? englishRoomType : vietnameseRoomType) const handleBlur = (input) => { if (input.value != '') { input.style.border = 'solid 1px #4874E8' } else { input.style.border = 'solid 1px #D9D9D9' } } const handleFocus = (input) => { input.style.border = 'solid 1px #4874E8' } const handleBedRoomPhoto = (data) => { let listImage = [...bedRoomPhoto] for (let i = 0; i < data.length; i++) { listImage.push(data[i]) } setBedRoomPhoto(listImage) } const handleWCPhoto = (data) => { let listImage = [...wcPhoto] for (let i = 0; i < data.length; i++) { listImage.push(data[i]) } setWCPhoto(listImage) } const handleOtherPhoto = (data) => { let listImage = [...otherPhoto] for (let i = 0; i < data.length; i++) { listImage.push(data[i]) } setOtherPhoto(listImage) } const handleDeleteBedRoomImage = (index) => { let afterRemove = [] for (let i = 0; i < bedRoomPhoto.length; i++) { if (i != index) { afterRemove.push(bedRoomPhoto[i]) } } setBedRoomPhoto(afterRemove) } return (
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} onChange={(e) => setRoomName(e.target.value)} />
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} id='numberOfRoom' className="input-inline" type='number' onChange={(e) => setNumberOfRoom(e.target.value)} />

handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} id='roomSize' className="input-inline" type='number' onChange={(e) => setRoomSize(e.target.value)} />
